title: bAlAmbikAyA param
sahitya:
bAlAmbikAyA param nahirE rE citta bhAratI ramA sEvitAyA shrI


anupallavi

 bAlEndu jita mukha pankajAya bhAnu kOTi kOTi lAvaNyAyA


caraNam   bhUsurAdi tri-sahasra munIshvara pUjita paradEvatAyA bhavarOga hara 
vaidya patIshvara sukha karyA guruguha jananyAh bhAsamAna vaidyapurIshvaryA 
vAncita phala pradEshvaryA phulla kalhAra mAlAdi dhAriNyAh niranjanyA
